topics.body:
Something I find kind of funny is the start of WW2.
Europe looks at the destitute Germany and says "Give us money." Germany says "We don't have anymore money." Europe says "Don't care. More money." And then Germany finally snaps and says "Fuck it! Come here Poland!"

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545c5c48636872394b600100#post_545c5c48636872394b600100
you see, the treatment of Germany after WWI is in violation with Robert Greene's laws of power wherein you "do not destroy the ego of your foe" because all you do is make him genuinely hate you.

Also Austria and the Ottomans didn't have to pay anything

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545c595b6368726a6a3e0000#post_545c595b6368726a6a3e0000
[spoiler]After living there for 8 years, it really made our family angry at life. Cost of living is high, the weather is pretty crummy all year long, and the population is mostly idiots. Doesn't help that we all live so close together either.

I could go on, but I fear I've already pissed some people off.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545c5e376368721886c90100#post_545c5e376368721886c90100
Trust me I know how you and your family feel.

This place is pretty damn stressful at times. But eh we make through it.

And god yes the Weather FUCKING SUCKS. It doesn't even snow here!
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545c5f076368724824970000#post_545c5f076368724824970000
Snow isn't all it's cracked up to be. Last winter was so terrible that we pretty much snapped and moved out. We would have moved a year later anyways, but I couldn't even take living out there for another winter to finish my senior year of high school.

you never know whether it will be rain or shine, doesn't matter what the weatherman say

also summer is too hot
winter is too cold
and despite living in canada
I NEVER GET ANY DAMN SNOW

christmas is probably my favourite time of the year
honestly i don't really care about the presents
if my family didn't get me anything i wouldn't care, and i have told them
it's just beautiful, and it makes me feel happy
